story-1.title: Morning Greeting
story-1.description: A simple morning conversation between friends
story-1.fullTranslation: Good morning! How are you? I'm fine, thank you for asking.

story-2.title: At the Market
story-2.description: Buying fruits at a local Thai market
story-2.fullTranslation: How much are the mangoes? Fifteen baht per kilo. I'll take two kilos please. Okay!

story-3.title: Finding the Way
story-3.description: Asking for directions to a famous temple
story-3.fullTranslation: Excuse me, where is the temple? Go straight, then turn right. It's not far, about a 5 minute walk. Thank you very much!

story-4.title: Ordering Food
story-4.description: Ordering a meal at a Thai restaurant
story-4.fullTranslation: I'd like Pad Thai, not spicy please. And cold water. Coming right up! Here you go, enjoy your meal!
